TopicTitle: KSP 1.3 roll on planes always inverted

Articles.Content:
I rebuilt my first plane in 1.3 several times, replaced the elevons, rotated them by 180° etc.

Whatever I did, the roll was inverted, rolling to right made the plane roll to left...

Testing the controls on runway showed the issue to me clearly, but I took off whatsoever to try it with a laughing and a crying eye.

Inverting the elevons inside VAB or on the runway didn't help, always the same.

The log and the craft:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3g5k510uai4neaa/2017-06-12-1 KSP.log.zip?dl=1

 

Edit:
As it seems Dynamic Deflection only works with FAR, I installed the unofficial 1.3 build and now the issue is gone.

Edited June 12, 2017 by Gordon Dry
